page.title: 07LOCAL SHOPPING HABITS
page.content: Murston is on the outskirts of Sittingbourne.We asked 40 local people about their shopping habits,and their opinions about local facilities.Most people only used local shops in emergencies or for just a few items because the shops are convenient.The majority felt the range of shops in Murston was quite sufficient.Very few people actually do their main weekly shopping locally.Most felt it was cheaper to travel to Sittingbourne to shop.About 50% walk to the town centre to shop whilst the majority of the remainder take their own cars.Very few people seem to use the bus service at all.Some people have papers,milk and soft drinks delivered to their homes.
